actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary, H. Rept. 93-1015.
Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of August 24, 1935 (commonly referred to as the "Miller Act") to provide for the inclusion of interest and legal fees in judgments granted on suits by subcontractors based upon payment bonds, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides, under the Miller Act, for the inclusion of interest and legal fees in judgments granted on suits by subcontractors based upon payment bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of August 24, 1935 (commonly referred to as the "Miller Act") to provide for the inclusion of interest and legal fees in judgments granted on suits by subcontractors based upon payment bonds, and for other purposes.
